content: Citgo, the subsidiary of Venezuela "state-owned" PDVSA, will donate Petty Island to the US state of New Jersey. Apparently, Chavez feels that this will strengthen ties with America. ---http://www.abn.info.ve/noticia.php?articulo=178349&lee=17

content: I have heard more than once from someone that "travels a lot" that if HC screws up badly enough again that some of his own will take him out. On one hand that is scary but on the other hand that is a relief since IMHO he is not good for humanity nor Venezuela in general (all three economic classes).
